actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A joint resolution to direct the Federal Communications Commission to conduct a comprehensive study and investigation of the effects of the display of violence in television programs.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission to conduct a comprehensive study and investigation of the effects of the display of violence in television programs. Requires the Commission to submit interim annual reports and a final report not later than thirty months after enactment of this Act containing the Commission's findings and recommendations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to direct the Federal Communications Commission to conduct a comprehensive study and investigation of the effects of the display of violence in television programs.
